name: Average Music Trivia: Van Halen Lyrics | 20 Questions

questions.text: Name the song: 'She wants to write him a letter, yeah yeah, I guess she's tryin' to make herself feel better'

questions.correct: Ice Cream Man & ice cream man
questions.explanation: Ice Cream Man & ice cream man.

questions.text: Name the song: 'Gay man, looking for another'
Name the song: '3 dollars first minute, after that it costs you 4!'

Name the song: 'Crank out the drums, crank out the bass, crank out my Les Paul in your face!'
questions.explanation:
One Way To Rock.

	This was actually a solo Sammy Hagar tune.

questions.text: Name the song: 'Don't draw the line, honey I ain't through with you, the harder the better'
